creator: u.cei@cbim.it
text:
The attached patch makes the JCR RI compile using the latest version of Commons
HTTP Client and the WebDAV client lib from Slide 2.0.

Actually, I'm not sure if changing:

  org.apache.util.HttpURL.getParent()

to

  org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpURL.getAboveHierPath()

is correct, so please review if you please.

after i started to migrate DavFileSystem to the webdavclient lib of slide 2.0 
and latest commons httpclient i discovered more issues in the current 
implementation of DavFileSystem.

as DavFileSystem is a leftover from an early version of the jcr ri and as is 
not used anymore i decided to remove it completely rather than fixing it, sorry.
creator: stefan@apache.org

text:
No problem with me. I'm not using DAVFileSystem and needed to upgrade HTTPClient
just because Cocoon uses a newer version. If there's no more need for it,
there's no chance of conflicts either.
creator: u.cei@cbim.it
